meanings.definition: Remove from a position of power or authority.
meanings.sent1: The king was deposing the corrupt official from his role.
meanings.sent2: The board decided to depose the CEO due to financial misconduct.
meanings.sent3: The cat deposing the dog as the ruler of the house was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The storm was deposing the mighty trees one by one.
meanings.sent5: The superhero deposing the villain from his evil plans saved the city.

meanings.definition: Testify to or give evidence under oath.
meanings.sent1: The witness was deposing about what he saw at the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: She had to depose in court regarding the contract she signed.
meanings.sent3: The parrot deposing in the courtroom made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her words were deposing against the defendant like a sharp sword.
meanings.sent5: The detective deposing with confidence helped solve the mystery.
